plot: Ann Miller hosts this documentary short on the making of the MGM-Cole Porter hot musical "Kiss Me Kate".
title: Cole Porter in Hollywood: Too Darn Hot
plot_es: Ann Miller hosts this documentary short on the making of the MGM-Cole Porter hot musical "Kiss Me Kate".
original_name: Cole Porter in Hollywood: Too Darn Hot
plot_en: Ann Miller hosts this documentary short on the making of the MGM-Cole Porter hot musical "Kiss Me Kate".
